artworks.title: CRT
artworks.fullDescription: A commissioned character sketch with a digital CRT style effect. This piece was created for a client looking for a unique representation of their OC.

artworks.title: ULTRAKILL Fan Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A fan poster I created for the indie game ULTRAKILL. This piece showcases my love for the game's unique aesthetic and characters while demonstrating my illustration skills.

artworks.title: HexVR Knight
artworks.fullDescription: This digital painting depicts a knight character from the HexVR universe. I focused on creating dynamic lighting and a dramatic atmosphere to bring this character to life.

artworks.title: Magi Concept Art
artworks.fullDescription: Official concept art I created for the Magi character class in HexVR. This design shows the standard armor set with attention to functional details and magical elements.

artworks.title: Kepler Concept Art
artworks.fullDescription: Official concept art for the Kepler character class in HexVR. The design emphasizes technological elements and a more futuristic aesthetic compared to other character classes.

artworks.title: Room Study
artworks.fullDescription: A digital study of an interior space focusing on lighting, perspective, and atmospheric elements. This was a personal practice piece to improve my environment art skills.

artworks.title: Magi Close-Up Detail
artworks.fullDescription: A detailed close-up of the Magi character concept, focusing on the intricate elements of the facial design and headgear.

artworks.title: HexVR Environment Study
artworks.fullDescription: An environmental concept painting for the HexVR world, showcasing the unique landscape and atmosphere of one of the game's regions.
